content:
For May, do we want to participate host an FSF LibreLocal event again? See #boston > 2025-05 meetup and https://libreplanet.org/wiki/FSF40/meetups for what we did last year, which was to meet at Hamilton at 7pm.

According to the email I got from the FSF, https://www.fsf.org/blogs/community/librelocal-2026-is-in-may-start-organizing-meetups is the place to look for details for this year. There's a chance they would even send a little money our way for food and drinks if we submit a request via https://my.fsf.org/librelocal-2026-support-request by March 15th.
